surface_layer.definition: A substance that can be burned to produce energy.

deep_layer.mechanism: Fuels contain chemical energy that is released through combustion, a chemical reaction with oxygen.
deep_layer.origin: Formed from various natural processes, such as the decomposition of organic matter.

visual_features: Variable depending on type (e.g., Black, Brown, Liquid, Solid)
shape: Variable depending on type (e.g., Lump, Liquid, Gas)
